Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Fertilizer^reset; to the green-tailed cat at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 现在你可以创造一些更先进的化学制品，并种植更好的作物！赶快将你的^orange;炼金台^reset;升级为^orange;化学操作台^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: Now you can create some more advanced chemicals, and grow even better crops! Upgrade your ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; into a ^orange;Chemistry Lab^reset; as soon as you are able.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;肥料^reset;是生产任何具有实际价值的作物所必需的。若想制作一些，你首先需要一个^orange;炼金台^reset;。为了这个项目，我需要一桶^orange;肥料^reset;。给我拿一些来，好吗？
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Fertilizer^reset; is essential to produce plants of any real value. To make some, you will first need an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset;. I need 1 barrel of ^orange;Fertilizer^reset; for this project. Bring me some, would you?
